snippet: A pursuit of a pickup packed with people suspected of being illegal immigrants ended today with deputies being videotaped as they clubbed the driver and swung at a woman.         "It's another Rodney King," said Ramona Ripston, executive director ...
lead_paragraph: A pursuit of a pickup packed with people suspected of being illegal immigrants ended today with deputies being videotaped as they clubbed the driver and swung at a woman. "It's another Rodney King," said Ramona Ripston, executive director of the American Civil Liberties Union of Southern California, who immediately called for a Justice Department investigation.

headline.main: California TV Crews Tape Police Beating
